abstract: CNN is remaking its morning schedule; Soledad O'Brien will anchor from 7 to 9 am weekdays, and Ashleigh Banfield will co-anchor from 5 to 7 am; plan will effectively dismantle American Morning.
snippet: The channel’s plan, which includes Soledad O’Brien and Ashleigh Banfield, is expected to effectively dismantle “American Morning.”
lead_paragraph: The channel’s plan, which includes Soledad O’Brien and Ashleigh Banfield, is expected to effectively dismantle “American Morning.”

headline.main: CNN Is Said to Be Revamping Its Morning Lineup
headline.print_headline: A Morning Revamp Is Expected at CNN
headline.seo: CNN Expected to Revamp Its Morning Lineup
